content.html: I've been watching hurl.dev and now (v1.4.0) I'm finding it really easy to write tests: - GET http://localhost:8080/health HTTP/1.1 200 Cache-Control: no-cache [Asserts] jsonpath "$.status" == "ok" - $ hurl --test test/* It runs my tests SO FAST it's ridiculous
content.value:
I've been watching hurl.dev and now (v1.4.0) I'm finding it really easy to write tests:

-
GET http://localhost:8080/health

HTTP/1.1 200
Cache-Control: no-cache
[Asserts]
jsonpath "$.status" == "ok"
-

$ hurl --test test/*

It runs my tests SO FAST it's ridiculous
